title: how do i go back to old client? im 100% sure it said we can change back if we werent happy with new1
body: bs lagging new client . doent help rito lied by saying we can change back if we didnt like it. . . . havent seen any options to allow me to change it . . . . .. hmmmmmmmmm + they owe me for getting leavers because of it . . . . in rank . . . .

replies.body: cheers guys took a while but yes run as admin was best way for me :) makes a big change in time when loading in champ select ,thanks again
Either uninstall, use the admin version of the game or swap to legacy just before logging in each game
To swap back to the old client just press the ["Launch legacy client"](https://i.gyazo.com/14599ff9bea2402ba26450f756ec3320.png) button on the bottom right when you log in.
nah just shuts it self down mate no good

Hmm, try this:

1. Open up your hard drive (mine is called _"Local Disk (C:)"_ ).

2. Open up the _Riot Games_ folder and then the _League of Legends_ folder.

3. Scroll down until you find _"lol.launcher.admin"_ and open it.
